The narrator in the advertisement claims: on and includes a clip of Dr. Fauci saying, "I can't imagine that... anybody could be doing more." This aspect verifies the claim by showcasing Fauci's positive remarks about Trump's response to the coronavirus.
Dr: Fauci issued a statement in response to the ad, stating that he has never publicly endorsed any political candidate and that the comments attributed to him were taken out of context. This aspect verifies the claim by highlighting Fauci's denial of endorsing Trump's response to the virus.
The full remarks from Dr: Fauci's interview on Fox News reveal that he was discussing the collective efforts of federal public health officials and not specifically endorsing Trump's response. This aspect verifies the claim by providing the complete context of Fauci's statement.
